name: goplan-common
description: a financial planning platform for the general public.

scripts.pre-commit: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -p "[{name}]" -n "Common,Backend,Frontend" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run lint-fix" "cd ../backend && npm run lint-fix"  "cd ../frontend && npm run lint-fix"
scripts.npm-update: concurrently  --kill-others-on-fail -p "[{name}]" -n "Common,Backend,Frontend" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm update" "cd ../backend && npm update"  "cd ../frontend && npm update"
scripts.npm-install: concurrently  --kill-others-on-fail -p "[{name}]" -n "Common,Backend,Frontend" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm i" "cd ../backend && npm i"  "cd ../frontend && npm i"
scripts.build: concurrently  --kill-others-on-fail -p "[{name}]" -n "Backend,Frontend" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "cd ../backend && npm run build"  "cd ../frontend && npm run build"

author: GoPlan-Finance team
